Pre-Game Insights: South Africa take on the West Indies in the first T20I of their three-match bilateral series at the Brian Lara Stadium in Tarouba, Trinidad, on Friday, August 23.
South Africa are likely to hand out a debut to young left-arm seamer Kwena Maphaka on Friday.
The Test series precluding the T20Is was won by the visitors 1-0 and this will make the Windies hungry for success in the latter.
South Africa's white-ball head coach Rob Walter believes in Maphaka's abilities and is willing to back him to the hilt.
Walter mentioned that Maphaka's experience playing in the IPL for the Mumbai Indians earlier this season will benefit him.
